pr_title: Updated README.md to match current design iteration of interface

timeline.message: Updated README.md to match current design iteration of interface

timeline.bodyText: Not sure if you also want to update the name of the arg
timeline.author: spfink
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -134,7 +156,7 @@ key differences:
    an asynchronous DynamoDb client from the SDK as well):
    ```java
     AsyncMappedDatabase database = DynamoDbAsyncMappedDatabase.builder()
-                                                              .dynamoDbAsyncClient(dynamoDbAsyncClient)
+                                                              .dynamoDbClient(dynamoDbAsyncClient)

replies.bodyText: That was deliberate to show that we were actually passing in an async client.
replies.author: bmaizels

timeline.bodyText: Is there a create method on VersionedRecordExtension if it can be done no-args?
timeline.author: spfink
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -184,18 +206,20 @@ that write will fail.
 To load the extension:
 ```java
 MappedDatabase database = 
-  MappedDatabase.builder()
-                .dynamoDbClient(dynbamoDbClient)
-                .extendWith(VersionedRecordExtension.builder().build())
-                .build();
+  DynamoDbMappedDatabase.builder()
+                        .dynamoDbClient(dynbamoDbClient)
+                        .extendWith(VersionedRecordExtension.builder().build())

replies.bodyText: There probably should be, but there isn't, so this is accurate. We plan to integrate that plugin into the core of the mapper anyway so it will be moot soon.
replies.author: bmaizels
